mapper.insert: INSERT INTO login (type, email) SELECT #{type}, #{email} FROM DUAL WHERE NOT EXISTS(SELECT type, email FROM login WHERE type=#{type} AND email=#{email})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM login WHERE email = #{email} AND type=#{type}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO alchol_record (user_seq, alchol_seq, star, abv, incense, taste, texture, img_seq, time, flower, fruit, grain, nut, sweetness, dairy, etc) VALUES (#{user_seq}, #{alchol_seq}, #{star}, #{abv}, #{incense}, #{taste}, #{texture}, #{img_seq}, #{time}, #{flower}, #{fruit}, #{grain}, #{nut}, #{sweetness}, #{dairy}, #{etc})
mapper.update: UPDATE alchol_record SET star = #{star}, abv = #{abv}, incense = #{incense}, taste = #{taste}, texture = #{texture}, img_seq = #{img_seq}, time = #{time}, flower = #{flower}, fruit = #{fruit}, grain = #{grain}, nut = #{nut}, sweetness = #{sweetness}, dairy = #{dairy}, etc = #{etc} WHERE user_seq = #{user_seq} AND alchol_seq=#{alchol_seq}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM alchol_record WHERE user_seq=#{user_seq} AND alchol_seq=#{alchol_seq}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM alchol_record WHERE user_seq=#{user_seq} AND alchol_seq=#{alchol_seq}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT B.seq, B.user_seq, B.alchol_seq, B.star, B.abv, B.incense, B.taste, B.texture, B.img_seq, B.time, B.flower, B.fruit, B.grain, B.nut, B.sweetness, B.dairy, B.etc FROM (SELECT * FROM alchol WHERE name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') ) AS A INNER JOIN alchol_record AS B ON A.seq=B.alchol_seq UNION DISTINCT SELECT C.seq, C.user_seq, C.alchol_seq, C.star, C.abv, C.incense, C.taste, C.texture, C.img_seq, C.time, C.flower, C.fruit, C.grain, C.nut, C.sweetness, C.dairy, C.etc FROM (SELECT * FROM alchol_record WHERE abv LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR flower LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR fruit LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR grain LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR nut LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR sweetness LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR dairy LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR etc LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')) AS C INNER JOIN alchol AS D ON D.seq=C.alchol_seq) AS E WHERE E.user_seq=#{user_seq}
